title: The Duke of Millaine A tragædie. As it hath beene often acted by his Maiesties seruants, at the blacke Friers. Written by Philip Massinger Gent.
author: Massinger, Philip, 1583-1640.
publisher: Prinred [sic] by B[ernard] A[lsop] for Edward Blackmore, and are to be sold at his shop at the great south doore of Pauls,
notes: Signatures: A²  chi²  B-M⁴. Chi2 is blank, and may occur folded around the back of quire A.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
